hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Full-Stack Developer with more than 2 years of experience, focused on creating scalable and performance-optimized applications. My passion is software architecture and continuous improvement, always looking for new challenges to innovate and provide efficient solutions.

projects.title: Notable Achievements
projects.subtitle: Highlighted projects
projects.description1: Development and maintenance of web applications with Laravel, Angular and Vue.js. Scaling application to SaaS with optimized architecture for multiple clients.
projects.description2: Significant improvement in response times and resource consumption. Implementation of WebSockets for real-time applications and automation with CRON Jobs.
projects.description3: Development of REST APIs with focus on security and scalability. Integration of geolocation services and external systems.
projects.description4: Deployment automation using Git, Docker and GitHub Actions. Implementation of agile methodologies and development best practices.
projects.description5: Design and implementation of a scalable architecture for efficient business data management, with real-time synchronization and high availability.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: My main skills
skills.problemSolvingDescription: Ability to identify and resolve technical problems efficiently.
skills.adaptabilityDescription: Flexibility to adapt to new technologies and work environments.
skills.timeManagementDescription: Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
skills.attentionToDetailDescription: Meticulous focus on quality and precision of work performed.
skills.teamworkDescription: Experience in agile environments and effective collaboration in multidisciplinary teams.
skills.effectiveCommunicationDescription: Ability to communicate technical ideas clearly and concisely.
